hotels.title: Kazakhstan All-Inclusive Seafront Oasis with Four Pools, Private Beach & Water Park
hotels.description: Set along the shimmering shores of the Caspian Sea, this sprawling Rixos gem is a beachfront haven for families, couples and adventure seekers alike. Dive into excitement at TETYSBLU, Kazakhstan’s first integrated aqua and theme park, or enjoy a variety of activities - from tennis and beach volleyball to yoga, tai chi and more. With four outdoor pools, including a sweeping infinity pool, there’s endless five-star fun to be had. When it’s time to unwind, the indulgent Anjana Spa invites guests to relax with traditional Turkish hammam rituals and rejuvenating treatments. Little ones are entertained at the vibrant Rixy Kids Club, while food lovers can relish global cuisine at Turquoise Restaurant, enjoy flame-grilled delights at Lezz'et Steakhouse or sip craft cocktails with ocean views at Infinity Bar.
